queue.title: Deep-explore one new platform end-to-end (d049)
queue.description: pick an unevaluated service, register, post, measure response

queue.title: Integrate probe-depth into cron platform probe
queue.description: Wire --depth flag into cron-platform-probe.sh so depth scores are auto-updated in services.json. Enables platform picker to prefer higher-depth platforms.

queue.title: Add tests for engagement-trace.json handling
queue.description: engagement-trace.json touched 4+ times in recent sessions. Add unit tests to stabilize trace archiving, dedup, and session attribution logic in session-context.mjs.

queue.title: Knowbster collection bundles
queue.description: knowbster-autopublish.mjs publishes individual patterns. Build a collection wrapper that bundles 5-10 related patterns into curated packs (e.g. 'Agent Architecture Patterns') with a single purchase. Requires collection creation API call wrapping individual listings.

queue.title: Consolidate E-session post-hooks into single dispatcher
queue.description: 7 E-session-only post-hooks (36-intel-checkpoint, 37-d049-enforcement, 38-early-exit, 39-note-fallback, 40-trace-fallback, 41-quality-audit, 42-quality-enforce) total ~900 lines with repeated session-type guards and JSON parsing. Merge into a single e-session-posthook.sh dispatcher that parses engagement-trace.json once and runs all checks sequentially. Reduces hook count and startup overhead.

queue.title: Fix stale-refs checker false positive on breadcrumb content
queue.description: stale-refs.json flags dialogue.md in stigmergy-breadcrumbs.json because bc-1543-auto's content field says 'fix(wq-659): remove stale dialogue.md references'. The checker does naive string matching — should exclude content/description fields or use path-pattern matching only.

outcome.note: Added is_structural_ref() filter to stale-ref-check.sh — excludes matches found only in prose fields (content, description, note, title, summary, body) of JSON files. Verified false positive eliminated and structural refs still detected.

queue.title: Investigate R session rapid-exit pattern (s1546-s1548)
queue.description: 3 consecutive R sessions had very short durations: s1546 (2m28s, $1.09), s1547 (0m35s, $0.40), s1548 (0m06s, missing from cost-history). All had no file edits. s1549 recovered to normal (6m04s, $1.76). Check session logs and heartbeat.sh R-session startup path for root cause.

outcome.note: Root cause: retry cascade. s1546 R session exited non-zero (likely tool/prompt error), causing rotation-state retry logic to repeat R mode. s1547 (retry 1) and s1548 (retry 2) were progressively shorter as each R hit cooldown with nothing to do, also exiting non-zero. s1549 (retry 3) succeeded normally, breaking cycle. Self-healing via MAX_RETRIES=3 cap worked as designed. Session logs rotated so exact error unrecoverable. One-time transient — BEBRA pattern has only 1 R/cycle, making consecutive R collisions structurally unlikely. No code fix needed.
